extensions.description: // Single line comments -or- /* Single line comments */ -or- /* Multiline comments */
<!-- Single line comments --> -or- {{* Single and Multiline comments *}} -or- // Single line comments -or- /* Single line comments */ -or- /* Multiline comments */
<!-- Single line and Multiline comments --> -or- {::comment} Single line and Multiline comments {:/comment} -or- []: # Single line comments
